title: Islanding Detection and Response
description: A large solar farm's connection to the main grid is lost, but it continues to energize a section of the distribution network, creating a dangerous 'island'. The system must detect this and trip the solar farm offline.

tasks.description: Monitor voltage and frequency at the solar farm's point of interconnection using synchrophasor data.
tasks.expected_outcome: System is continuously monitoring grid conditions.

tasks.description: The system detects a phase angle shift and frequency deviation that are characteristic of an islanding condition.
tasks.expected_outcome: System's anti-islanding algorithm triggers an alarm.

tasks.description: Send a direct trip signal to the solar farm's protective relay to immediately de-energize it.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully trips the solar farm offline, eliminating the safety hazard.
